titleStmt.title: For the encouragement of the consumption of the woollen manufacture of this kingdom, it is humbly proposed to the consideration of the Parliament, now assembled; that a clause be added to the bill depending, for encouragement of the woollen manufacture, to prohibit the making and vending of cane chairs, stools, and couches, for the future.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
